definition[0]: a small thin piece of steel, with a point at one end and a hole in the other, used for sewing
definition[2]: a very thin, pointed steel tube at the end of a syringe, which is pushed into your skin to put a drug or medicine into your body or to take out blood
example[2]: She carried hypodermic needles and syringes in her bag.
example[3]: Drug users are at risk when they share needles.
definition[3]: a long thin piece of metal on a scientific instrument that moves backwards and forwards and points to numbers or directions
definition[4]: a long, very thin piece of metal used in acupuncture (=a kind of medical treatment originally used in China)
definition[5]: a small needle-shaped leaf, especially from a pine tree
definition[6]: the very small, pointed part in a record player that touches the record in order to play it
example[7]: I don't think he even knows how to use a needle!
example[8]: I got a needle and thread and sewed the button back on.
example[9]: This gadget helps you put the thread through the eye of the needle.
definition[7]: to deliberately annoy someone by making unkind remarks or jokes about them
example[10]: I just said that to Charlie to needle him.
